original_text: If they do, I will send rain at the proper time. Plants for food will grow in the ground. Fruit will grow on your trees.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 철따라 비를 주리니 땅은 그 산물을 내고 밭의 나무는 열매를 맺으리라

sentences.original_text: I will send rain at the proper time
Plants for food will grow in the ground
Fruit will grow on your trees
